title: News24.com | Nigerian man shot dead for flouting virus lockdown
description: A Nigerian man has been shot dead for allegedly flouting a stay-at-home order aimed at curbing the spread of coronavirus, police and a lawmaker says.
content:
A Nigerian man has been shot dead for allegedly flouting a stay-at-home order aimed at curbing the spread of coronavirus, police and a lawmaker said on Friday.
Nigeria has introduced a raft of measures, including lockdowns of major cities, to try to contain … [+1435 chars]
